title: Ummm. League is broken. Anyone else?
body: Absolutely nothing works. I cant click on play. I cant get into loot. The home page wont load. I cant see any mastery points on my champs in collection, so it looks like I have never played a single game on any of them. I cant get to my profile page. And here's the kicker. I cant report a bug, that web page also doesn't work. Help? Also, is anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: Everything is Broken
Same issue here, stuck on accept game.
Yup. The ! at the top can tell you there's a lot of us with those issues ;)

Honestly, this launcher has been broken for a while, but this is somewhat the extent of what the problems with the current one can do. The most recent patch broke it almost completely and it's obvious that Riot needs to upgrade/replace their launcher with a more clean and fluid-like program that works really well.

Also, it's not completely broken, it's just taking A LONG TIME to load. Mine finally loaded up after like 10 minutes or so.

Most PC games nowadays have launchers that are far more superior to this and work with barely any issues. I'm not saying the League launcher is riddled with bugs, but there are noticeable ones that do cause almost significant issues, like the Champion select/ban functionality which sometimes doesn't let you pick anything for a random amount of time. I understand that money and time are a factor for Riot, but they need to focus their attentions on bug fixes and upgrading the game, and its launcher, or they're gonna fall FAR behind the game developers they're competing against in the gaming industry.
